content:
I think I'll go with the Caprese Salad. I love the combination of fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. It's so simple yet flavorful. Plus, it's a great way to showcase the flavors of the Italian dish without overpowering the lasagna.

By the way, have you tried that new Italian place downtown, Bella Vita? I had their veggie lasagna last week, and it was amazing!
